name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development and a strong command over cloud services such as **AWS**, **Google Cloud Services**, and **Azure**. Proficient in managing container orchestration and virtualization technologies with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Expertise in database management systems including **MS SQL Server**, **Oracle**, and **PostgreSQL**. Possesses advanced skills in programming languages including **JavaScript** and **Python**, coupled with the ability to design and implement **RESTful APIs**.

Demonstrated ability to deliver high-performance solutions in challenging environments, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems designing. Proven problem-solving and mentoring skills alongside effective requirements gathering and communication abilities. Passionate about driving customer success through technical insights and strategic solutions.
